instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.AVREF_SMC: What is AVREF_SMC? AVREF_SMC is a reference voltage provided to the SMC so that its sensors have a reference to work from, this should be 3.3v.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> only SSD T°, fan at full speed
threads.message:
Hi, today I receive this machine, fan speed is high always, it takes 3 or 4 bottom press to power up, it doesn't power up just connecting charger.

I install hwsensors and only shows SSD T°, also battery info is not available. Battery don't charge, and when battery is plug, charger light turn green and orange randomly.

No water damage or other damage visible in the board. I also try another trackpad, same problem and booting another High Sierra from USB, to see if the problem was the OS.

Can it be SMC failure, should I reball it or change it? or is something else?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> only SSD T°, fan at full speed
